mapper.select: SELECT hr.id,hr.healthUser,u.userName,hr.healthDescription,hr.reportDate,hr.bodyTemperature,hr.rnaTest, (CASE WHEN hr.needQuarantine = 1 THEN '需要' WHEN hr.needQuarantine = 0 THEN '不需要' ELSE '数据错误' END) needQuarantine FROM sys_healthreport hr LEFT JOIN sys_user u ON hr.healthuser=u.id ${ew.customSqlSegment}
